text: Chu yi zui you de fangshi wai, nimen buyao yu xinfeng tian jing de ren bianlun, chufei tamen zhong bu yi de ren. Nimen yingdang shuo:“Women quexin jiang shi women de jingdian, he jiang shi nimen de jingdian; women suo chongbai de he nimen suo chongbai de shi tong yige shenming, women shi guishun ta de.”
